course_title: Special Topics: Human Health: Interoception & Touch in HLTH
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 19 / Seats Avail: 8Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Sensation of our internal state, or interoception, influences well-being.  We will examine multiple interoception modalities, including soft touch, pain, breathing, and temperature, and how we can leverage these physiological sensations through acupuncture, sauna, and meditation to improve health.
course_description: Seminar of lecture series of topics in human health. May be repeated for credit when topic varies. Credit varies from one to four hours.
sections: Class Nbr: 5303, Section #: 10, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: Freeman/Noble, Status: Open
